Reshape Data from Wide to Long Format

Source: R/utils_helpers_export.R
wide_to_long.Rd

Converts a data.frame or matrix in wide format (with an ID column and repeated‐measure columns named <variable>_<time>, e.g. V1_1, V1_2) into long format. The resulting data has columns ID, any between‐subject factors, time, and one column per measure.

Usage

wide_to_long(data)

Arguments

data

A data.frame or matrix in wide format. If a matrix is provided, it will be coerced to a data.frame. Must have at least two columns matching the regex "<var>_<time>".

Value

A data.frame in long format with columns ID, any between‐subject factors (if present), time (integer), and one column per measure.
